scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a religious encounter within an architectural setting. A haloed figure, likely a saint or Christ Child, stands to the left, facing a bearded man wearing a crown and ornate robes, who is positioned centrally. To the right, a kneeling figure with a tonsure and simple attire looks up towards the central figures. The background features architectural elements suggesting an interior space, with a large arch overhead and a column. The overall composition implies a moment of reverence or presentation.
